des: Serial Entrepreneur Richard Matharoo shares daily 90 second shortcast snippets of inspiration, tips, tactics, questions and stories to set you up for 24 hours of productivity in your business. If you are a home or small business owner, make Richard's show part of your podcast or flash briefing morning routine
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
